dependencies.description: Hatch plugin for versioning with your preferred VCS
dependencies.name: py-hatch-vcs

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: Ahead of Time (AOT) Triton Math Library.
dependent_to.name: aotriton

dependent_to.description:
GPTune is an autotuning framework that relies on multitask and transfer
learnings to help solve the underlying black-box optimization problem
using Bayesian optimization methodologies.
dependent_to.name: gptune

dependent_to.description:
CacheControl is a port of the caching algorithms in httplib2 for use
with requests session object.
dependent_to.name: py-cachecontrol

dependent_to.description:
Chainer is a Python-based deep learning framework aiming at
flexibility. It provides automatic differentiation APIs based on the
define-by-run approach (a.k.a. dynamic computational graphs) as well as
object-oriented high-level APIs to build and train neural networks. It
also supports CUDA/cuDNN using CuPy for high performance training and
inference.
dependent_to.name: py-chainer

dependent_to.description:
Datasets is a lightweight library providing two main features: one-line
dataloaders for many public datasets and efficient data pre-processing.
dependent_to.name: py-datasets

dependent_to.description: Google Drive Public File/Folder Downloader.
dependent_to.name: py-gdown

dependent_to.description:
Client library to download and publish models, datasets and other repos
on the huggingface.co hub.
dependent_to.name: py-huggingface-hub

dependent_to.description:
The Deep Learning framework to train, deploy, and ship AI products
Lightning fast.
dependent_to.name: py-litdata

dependent_to.description:
A general purpose workflow conductor for running multi-step simulation
studies.
dependent_to.name: py-maestrowf

dependent_to.description: Neuroimaging in Python: Pipelines and Interfaces.
dependent_to.name: py-nipype

dependent_to.description:
PSI/J is an abstraction layer over cluster schedulers to write scheduler
agnostic HPC applications.
dependent_to.name: py-psij-python

dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.
dependent_to.name: py-ray

dependent_to.description:
A workflow library to easily integrate machine learning libraries with
high performance computing simulations and applications
dependent_to.name: py-smartsim

dependent_to.description:
Accurately separates a URL's subdomain, domain, and public suffix,
using the Public Suffix List (PSL). By default, this includes the public
ICANN TLDs and their exceptions. You can optionally support the Public
Suffix List's private domains as well.
dependent_to.name: py-tldextract

dependent_to.description:
Tensors and Dynamic neural networks in Python with strong GPU
acceleration.
dependent_to.name: py-torch

dependent_to.description: tox is a generic virtualenv management and test command line tool.
dependent_to.name: py-tox

dependent_to.description:
State-of-the-art Natural Language Processing for TensorFlow 2.0 and
PyTorch
dependent_to.name: py-transformers

dependent_to.description: A language and compiler for custom Deep Learning operations.
dependent_to.name: py-triton

dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv

dependent_to.description:
ReFrame is a framework for writing regression tests for HPC systems. The
goal of this framework is to abstract away the complexity of the
interactions with the system, separating the logic of a regression test
from the low-level details, which pertain to the system configuration
and setup. This allows users to write easily portable regression tests,
focusing only on the functionality.
dependent_to.name: reframe

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

dependent_to.description:
Survey is a high level performance tool product from Trenza, Inc. The
survey collector/analytics framework is a new generation, high level,
lightweight multiplatform Linux tool set that targets metric collection
for high level performance analysis of applications running on both
single node and on large scale platforms, including the Cray platforms.
The collector is designed to work on sequential, MPI, OpenMP, and hybrid
codes and directly leverages several interfaces available for tools
inside current MPI implementations including: MPICH, MVAPICH, MPT, and
OpenMPI. It also supports multiple architectures and has been tested on
machines based on Intel, AMD, ARM, and IBM P8/9 processors and
integrated AMD and NVIDIA GPUs. Survey is a licensed product with the
source not openly available. To access the survey source and build with
spack please contact: Trenza Inc. via: dmont@trenzasynergy.com or
jeg@trenzasynergy.com
dependent_to.name: survey

description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication
name: py-filelock

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
